data: Tom Gale leaned heavily on the low bulwarks of the little schooner _Lucy_, his arms folded upon the aforesaid bulwarks, his short, black clay pipe in his mouth, and his eyes fixed on the flowing tide glittering in the sunlight of a clear October day.
browsing: crime/mystery|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: novels|category: british literature
